Name: Alpaca
SeedDescription: Plant these in summer. Takes 11 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en verano. Tardan 11 en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 또는 여름 작물. 성장하려면 8일이 소요됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en été. Prend 11 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket nyáron ültesse el. 11 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante isso no verão. Leva 11 dias para amadurecer.
